job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: At Hookit we help brands maximize their sponsorship investments while empowering athletes teams leagues and federations to prove and increase their value to sponsors We are growing our team to support our meteoric growth in the new media datadriven and insight focused sports sponsorship analytics space  an industry and approach we pioneered nearly five years agoltbrgtltbrgtOverviewltbrgtltbrgtWere searching for an experienced Software Engineer to help us continue building out our platform This is an awesome opportunity to take what youve successfully done with NET Core  ASPNET to help build new solutions and troubleshoot  restructure existing code If you dig working with a growing team in a very cool workspace then give us a shout  we want your experienceltbrgtltbrgtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltulgtltligtParticipate in full lifecycle software developmentltligtltligtHelp transform current architecture into the next generationltligtltligtContribute to new feature designs APIs and implementationsltligtltligtThink ampamp discuss architecture reliability optimization with othersltligtltligtIntroduce technology to improve system and subsystems performance reliability and productivityltligtltligtWork on a variety of C projects with focus on scalingltligtltligtDevelop a big picture understanding of how to meet customer needsltligtltligtBecome an expert with a handful of global social networks APIs FB IG Twitter VK WeiboltbrgtltligtltulgtMinimum RequirementsltbrgtltulgtltligtBABS in Computer Science a related field or a similar college level educationltligtltligt4 years relevant experience in Net Core C ASPNet WCF MVC architectureltligtltligtExperienced in implementing highly scalable data intensive web and backend systemsltligtltligtHands on experience in deploying complex and highly scalable application on AWSltligtltligtExpert in implementing REST based APIsltligtltligtMS SQL Server and data warehousing databases Snowflake Redshift etcltligtltligtComfortable working within a fastpaced high growth startup environmentltligtltligtComfortable working in a remote environment with team members in different timezonesltligtltligtAuthorized to work in the USltbrgtltligtltulgtOur StoryltbrgtltbrgtHookit began as SponsorHouse a gamechanging service to connect amateur athletes with sponsors online Athletes ampamp founders Scott Tilton and RJ Kraus developed a platform that connected hundreds of thousands of athletes with millions of deals gathering mountains of data in the process And as the data grew so did the story it was starting to tellltbrgtltbrgtToday we are a fast growing team of sports and technology experts widely recognized for solving our customers needs with innovative reliable and easy to use toolsltbrgtltbrgtBased on the coast in San Diego California our culture is rooted in ensuring our team is happy with the work they are doing where they are doing it and who they are doing it with We want Hookit to be the best most fulfilling job everyone on our team has ever hadltbrgtltbrgtPowered by JazzHRltbrgtltbrgt47OJhuWqI7
